items.title: Review project structure and organization
items.description: Assess overall directory structure, file organization, and whether the current layout (api/, docs/, extensions/, schemas/, etc.) is logical and maintainable

items.title: Review README.md for clarity and completeness
items.description: Check if README clearly explains the project goals, contains accurate examples, has proper navigation, and is at the correct version (v0.4 vs header saying v0.3)

items.title: Audit extension documentation for version consistency
items.description: Per docs/extension-alignment-issues.md, update all extension docs to use version 0.4 instead of 0.2/0.3, and replace Phase→PlanItem terminology throughout

items.title: Review Go API implementation quality
items.description: Examine api/go/pkg/ structure (core, validator, parser, builder, query, updater, convert) for code quality, test coverage, performance, and API design consistency

items.title: Review test coverage and quality
items.description: Run coverage reports, identify gaps, assess test quality (unit vs integration), and ensure critical paths have adequate testing

items.title: Consider consolidating 'consider' documents
items.description: Reviewed all 6 consider docs. Recommendations in docs/exploratory-docs-recommendation.md: Tier 1 (keep 2), Tier 2 (archive 2), Tier 3 (owner decision on 4).

items.title: Review alternative format documents
items.description: Reviewed namespaced and TROY alternatives. Recommendation: archive both to history/proposals/ as valuable reference for architectural decisions already made.

items.title: Review schema files for correctness
items.description: Validate schemas/vbrief-*.schema.json files align with v0.4 spec and test against example documents

items.title: Assess Taskfile organization and completeness
items.description: Review Taskfile.yml for missing common tasks, consider splitting into included taskfiles if it grows too large, ensure all tasks have proper descriptions

items.title: Review and consolidate docs/ directory
items.description: Check docs/ for organization (warp.md, extension-alignment-issues.md, and any others), ensure consistent formatting and up-to-date information

items.title: Consider refactoring: consolidate extension docs
items.description: Recommendation: Keep separate (9 docs serve different audiences). Add navigation index and move to extensions/ directory. See docs/extension-docs-analysis.md

items.title: Consider refactoring: API consistency across languages
items.description: Comprehensive analysis completed. Critical issues found: all 3 API docs still reference Phase/PhaseStatus. Recommendations documented in docs/api-consistency-analysis.md. Estimated fix: 1-2 hours.

items.title: Review performance: Go API bottlenecks
items.description: Code analysis completed. No O(n²) algorithms or critical bottlenecks found. All operations are O(n) or better. Good practices: pre-allocated slices, streaming JSON, size limits. See docs/go-api-performance-analysis.md. Profiling recommended before v1.0 but not blocking.

items.title: Review readability: naming conventions
items.description: Audit naming consistency across codebase - file names, type names, function names, especially around Phase→PlanItem and PlaybookEntry→PlaybookItem transitions. All code uses PlanItem; PlaybookEntry references only in historical/tracking docs. Files use hyphens consistently.

items.title: Consider refactoring: separate spec from implementation
items.description: README is well-structured as unified spec. Current organization works - splitting would fragment canonical reference. Consider for v1.0 if it grows significantly.

items.title: Review git hooks and CI/CD setup
items.description: Check .github/ workflows, git hooks installation, and ensure quality gates are properly enforced in CI

items.title: Consider documentation improvements: visual aids
items.description: Would be beneficial for v1.0 documentation site. Not critical for current spec document. Recommend Mermaid diagrams for: memory tier relationships, extension dependencies, agentic workflow.

items.title: Review error messages and validation feedback
items.description: Check validator implementation for clear, actionable error messages that help users fix invalid documents

items.title: Assess example quality and coverage
items.description: Review examples/ directory - ensure examples cover common use cases, are up to date with v0.4, and demonstrate best practices

items.title: Consider API improvements: builder pattern ergonomics
items.description: Review api/go/pkg/builder for ease of use - consider fluent APIs or convenience methods for common operations

items.title: Update examples to use version 0.4
items.description: All examples updated to use version 0.4 instead of 0.2.

items.title: Update Go API to use PlanItem instead of Phase
items.description: Completed full refactoring from Phase/PhaseStatus to PlanItem/PlanItemStatus across core types, builder, validator, updater, tests, and examples. All tests passing.
